K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-1: badzra dzny'a na sa mutstsha ya n'a ma tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-3: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-5: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-6: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-10: sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-13: thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-15: ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-18: ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-20: yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-22: skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-23: ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-24: snang ba nye bar thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-26: de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-27: 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:181b-28: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-2: shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-3: sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-9: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-10: gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-11: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-14: thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-16: ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-19: rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-20: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-22: gang 'od gsal ba las byang chub se [?] par shes pa de nyid sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-24: rnam par shes pa zhes bya la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-26: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182a-27: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-0: rnam par byang ba'i @182b bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-2: rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-6: de rnams las phung po lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-10: rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-11: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-12: snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-19: de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-21: de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-28: ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-29: nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-30: shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-34: drag po la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-35: kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-39: sems las byung ba las sems te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-41: shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:182b-43: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-2: mngon sum gyi bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-6: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-8: nur nur po'i rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-9: de las mer mer po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-12: de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-13: de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-14: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-15: 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-16: bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-18: lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-19: gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa a'a li k'a li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-20: sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o; ;gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-21: dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-22: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-23: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-24: sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183a-25: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-0: de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon @183b pa ste; de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-12: me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-13: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-14: ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-15: ji ltar til las til mar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-16: de bzhin du rdo rjes ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-17: thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-19: shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-20: ji ltar 'o ma dang til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-21: gang gis bha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-22: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-23: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-24: las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:183b-25: phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-0: gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa @184a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-1: de ni; bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-8: nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-9: spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-12: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-19: 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184a-22: thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-0: bcom ldan 'das @184b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-1: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-2: stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-4: stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-6: ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-7: ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-8: ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-9: de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-10: ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du stong pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-12: stong pa chen po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-14: mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-17: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-20: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:184b-24: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-1: ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-3: gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-6: 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-7: bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-9: lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-13: 'od gsal bzhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-14: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-20: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-26: tsandan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-34: btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-38: bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185a-43: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-0: de bzhin du 'jig @185b rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-3: yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-15: de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-16: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chen phos gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-23: rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-25: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-26: rgyas par phyen grangs med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-27: gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-28: spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-29: bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-30: rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-32: stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-33: rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-39: sha sha sa haksha 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-40: ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-41: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-43: de rnams kyi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:185b-47: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-1: bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i bha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-2: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-3: rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-4: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-5: rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-6: de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-7: gnyi ga'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-8: las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-9: spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so; ;'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang spra byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-10: ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-11: bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-12: rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-13: skyon gyi rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186a-14: bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-1: rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-2: rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-5: rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-7: glang bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-8: mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-9: rig pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-10: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-11: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-12: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-13: bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-14: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-17: gang gi don du byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-21: mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-24: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-28: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-29: rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-34: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-39: dbye ba rnams pa gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:186b-43: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-1: rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-3: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-11: don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-12: stong pa chen po bco brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-16: don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-18: ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-19: gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-20: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-21: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187a-22: bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-0: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na ka ra'i zhal snga @187b nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-1: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a pa khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-2: slad nas bla ma de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-3: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-4: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-5: rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-6: ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-7: mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-8: de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-10: de ston pa la der brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-003:187b-11: gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin //
